summary: A new, isolated Home-page footer block component was added to display the authenticated Internet Identity Principal ID with a copy-to-clipboard button and English success/failure feedback. App wiring appears to include conditional display on the home route per the provided diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project metadata/state tracking (project_state.json) with AR-1..AR-4 entries unrelated to implementing the UI behavior itself.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks for a temporary Principal ID display + copy control on the Home page; it does not request updating project tracking/state files.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated a repository-wide summary file (frontend-file-summaries.txt) describing many unrelated changes (admin gating, order page disclaimer removals, tailwind config, deployment guide, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is narrowly scoped to showing Principal ID on the Home page; generating/updating broad file summaries (especially mentioning unrelated feature work) is not requested.
